about_the_game:
In a distant ocean, there is an island called Steam, and the man who possesses everything on this island is Mr. G. He once said, "Do you want my wealth? If you do, take it. Only those who can create the best games deserve it." So countless young people, driven by their dreams, set out for the distant land called Steam. And you will also play the role of an independent game producer, using four different rhythm game mechanics to complete a series of levels involving art, programming, debugging, and review and release. Finally, in the game, you will create and publish your independent game to compete for the treasure on the island of Steam.

Game features:


1. Experience 4 different audio game gameplays in the same game to develop your own game

In the game, you will have an open space to build your own game. Your game will continue to improve and change as you complete the levels. You can preview the changes in your game at any time.

  • Art level gameplay: As the camera moves, the scene will follow the rhythm of the music, and different types of icons that require player operation will appear. When you complete the correct operation at the right time, you can Create trees, houses, props and other items to complete the construction of art scenes.
  • Programming level gameplay: In the programming level, there will be a series of instructions that need to be completed through the direction keys to simulate the completion of code writing, and you need to follow the rhythm of the music and press the confirmation key at the correct time. In the game, you need to use this method to complete the "development" tasks of functional logic such as characters, enemies, and level UI.
  • Debug level gameplay: After completing the programming chapter, your game will have many BUGs. In this level, your "code" will be scanned line by line according to the rhythm of the music. You need to scan it in the correct During rhythm time, press the action button to eliminate bugs in your code.
  • Audit and release gameplay: After you complete your game development, you need to complete the audit level before you can publish your game. In this chapter, you will sprint forward on a runway with 5 roads. Different auditors will fire various bullets or obstacles at you according to the rhythm of the music. You need to avoid these obstacles by moving left and right or jumping.

2. In the game, you play as a game producer, telling a story of overcoming various challenges and eventually completing and releasing a game.
3. Each level in the game has a different music. You can enjoy various beautiful melodies in the game.
